channel.title: Please correct my code

item.title: Please correct my code
item.dc:creator: @i_like_rsps i like rsps
item.description:
@i_like_rsps wrote:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”)
&& (playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ajay”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1
                    && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                stillgfx(189, absY, absX);
                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported to "+p.playerName;
                sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to " + p.playerName);
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to..");
        }

[/code]

i think…

Read full topic

item.title: Please correct my code
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”)
&& (playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mironic”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1
                    && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                stillgfx(189, absY, absX);
                stillgfx(189, VictumY, VictumX);
                teleportToX = p.absX+1;
                teleportToY = p.absY+1;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported to "+p.playerName;
                sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to " + p.playerName);
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to..");
        }

[/code]
the victumY and X are for a random event puff of smoke when u teleport to someone

help?
